cing 'brel par 'byung ba chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
cu rtsa bdun chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa
med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /lan gcig
phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rang byang chub chags pa'am/ ma chags
pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar
chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi
'phel| ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing /
nam mkha'i legs pa'am/ ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /nam mkha'
ni legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur pa 'phel ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa
brjod kyang 'phel ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/ /
rab 'byor/ de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe zhum pa dang / g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
brtson par bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' la sgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang | 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar
bzhag pa rnams ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so/ /
nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ma mchis
so| |nam mkha' la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba
de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom
ldan 'das/ gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing yongs su grol par 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal
ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don
du| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i
chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha
'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dam bu'i byings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu
ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan
las 'das kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am/ gang bar mi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dpen pa'i slad
du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dam bu'i byings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/
bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
kyang bskal pa'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can
gyi khams la gang ba'am/ 'grib par mi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na bdag
'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar
'tshal zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o/ /de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi

phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu'ang yod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang
yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'ang yod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor
gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems pa de ni nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/

de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka /khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag
par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor
gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka /gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur
ro/ /gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ de la mi'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang ji skad du bstan
pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/ /kau shi ka /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par sems
pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor
dang | dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bcun pa rab 'byor/ de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa/ kau shi ka /de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing
dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka /de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab
par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa/ kau shi ka /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi
ka |de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par
nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa/ kau shi ka /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rmi lam lta

bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs
su shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la
rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/
rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom
sems su mi byed/ gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems
su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par
shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes
rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi
zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung pas rlom
sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam
gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi
byed| sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
sum cu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/
rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed
do| |'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis
rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis
rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/
sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis
rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom
sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su ma byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/
sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rlom sems su mi
byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom
sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /
sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul

dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye
mas| bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu
'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus
shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing
yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur te/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re
zhing yang / sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis
mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang
sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro//
gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam pa gang dang /
rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di la rab 'byor/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi
'gyur ro/ /gzugs bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ gzugs sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar
chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ gzugs zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
gzugs 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am
mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am
bdag med ces bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar
chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par
'byung ba bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug ces bya
ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston
par mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par
mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces
bya ba'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhi zhes bya ba'am/
ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
sum cu rtsa bdun 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad
med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes
bya ba'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug
ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol
zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
dang | gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma
zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/
ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal
zhes bya ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston
par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba'am/
grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
ro| |rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos ni ji ltar
ston par 'gyur/ ston na ci zhig gis ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston
par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched
dang | khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa
nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston
par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos
ston par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ skye
mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa
nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin
dang | gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang
dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa
thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na
'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
dang | stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar
na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa
dang | so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs la skye ba med pa
dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /
skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rten cing 'brel

par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes
pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni
gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag
pa'o| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs
su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la tha snyad
med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar/ nam mkha' la tha snyad med
pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
'byor/ nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor /gzhan
yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i
slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/
de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na chos thams
cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du
yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad
dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spongs
pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang
slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang /
bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar
'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis
pa| gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te /rigs
kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang / tshad med pa grangs med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab
tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni
'di yin te/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o//
rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i
skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho
ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa
gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor

dang | tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung
che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha'
mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod
do| |rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
dang | mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
sgo thams cad yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te /de la
bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal
chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha
nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba
dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi
lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /de bas na de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che
zhes bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba med do//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/ /rab
'byor| pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ 'dus
byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor/ pha rol tu phyin pa rin
po che la ni gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor/ de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'go
ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi
byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o/ /de ni
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing / sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems
can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa'am/ rnam par ston pa'am/ yongs su ston pa'am/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ 'byin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa'am/ 'gag par byed pa'am/
kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/ 'grib par byed pa'am/ 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar byed pa
med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams
las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgrub
pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med
pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgrub pa
ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub bsgrub pa ma yin/
'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi
khams sgrub pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi
dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par thugs
su chud do/ /mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo / /ston to/ /brjod do/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal
bar mdzad do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra phyung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku
mud dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / mnad ra ba dang / mnad ra ba chen po 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/ lha'i bu stong
phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor
la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba'ang ma yin/ gcig tu bskor ba'ang ma yin no/ /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang chos gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong
pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag
pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan
rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang /
snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang byang chub rang byang chub
kyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/ /
de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'ang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis/ chos kyi 'khor lo 'ang skor la chos
gang yang 'khor ba'am/ mi 'khor ba'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba'am/ yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis so/ /de ci'i
slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams
cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /
mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so/ /smon pa ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags
so| |de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / rab tu dgod pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par
dgrol ba dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyi ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ngo / /gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so/ /gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis
pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su'ang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thub pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba
dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang / 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i
phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang / sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med
pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan
ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs
pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su
med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid
du mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang
ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i
phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ 'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can
med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur
ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa'i
phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir
ro| |gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| chos thams cad 'tshol bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par 'grub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med
pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi
chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su
med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid
stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta
ste| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro//
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran
pa nye bar bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi
dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i
pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan/ 'di lta ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa dmigs
su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa dang / ser sna dmigs su
med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa'o| /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dang / bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dang / brtson 'grus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di
lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsam gtan dang / 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir
ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes rab dang / 'chal
pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi
'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das| 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol
pa| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams
cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
pa'o| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu
lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang
gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /gang 'dzin cing
'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par byas nas kyang de bzhin
nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag
par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so/ /yongs
su zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog
cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur la/ 'dzin cing 'chang
ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar
bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems
pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid
ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong
ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar
bsgom par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi
'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/ yongs su ma dris
so| |de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab na/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge
'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po
brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /kau shi ka /de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal
ba'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka /'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do/ /kau shi ka /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /
rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
brtson par bya'o/ /sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /khams
gsum gyi phul du 'byung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi
bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la brtson par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
